title: Erb und Umwaeltfaktoren Ben Neurosen: Tiefen Psychologische Untersuchungen an 50 zwillingspaaren (Hereditary and environmental factors in neurosis: depth-psychological studies of 50 pairs of twins). Monographien aus dem Gesamtgebiele der Psychiatrie, Psychiatry Series Band 11. By H. Schepank, with the collaboration of P. E. Becker, A. Heigl-Evers, C. O. Köhler, Helga Schepank, and G. Wagner. (Pp. vi + 227; DM89, $34.30.) Springer: Berlin, Heidelberg, New York. 1974.
abstract: Erb und Umwaeltfaktoren Ben Neurosen: Tiefen Psychologische Untersuchungen an 50 zwillingspaaren (Hereditary and environmental factors in neurosis: depth-psychological studies of 50 pairs of twins).
